thread.title: Ahsoka Tano (Fulcrum) is killing herself with a Health tax bug - Answer HQ
thread.title_full: Ahsoka Tano (Fulcrum) is killing herself with a Health tax bug - Answer HQ

author: AKAThePlaybook
title: Ahsoka Tano (Fulcrum) is killing herself with a Health tax bug - Answer HQ
text:
Product : Star Wars: Galaxy of Heroes
Platform : Android
What type of device are you experiencing the issue with? PC Client
OS Version PC
Ally Code: (Find it here: http://bit.ly/AllyCode )
What type of issue do you have? Gameplay
How often does the bug occur? Every time (100%)
Summarize your bug When a mechanic like Exile stops Fulcrum's unique from cleansing herself, she taxes herself every turn anyway as if she successfully cleansed, causing her to take hundreds of thousands of free damage. I suspect the same interaction happens with other blockers like Isolate or Plague.
Steps: How can we find the bug ourselves? Place a dispellable debuff on Ahsoka Tano (Fulcrum) while she has Exile. Note that she deals 15% of her Health every turn, despite not successfully cleansing anything.
Connection Type
Please select your region
Country
